attributes.name: :if
attributes.description: Conditional attribute `if`. The element is present in the final html when the condition is true.

attributes.name: :elseif
attributes.description: Conditional attribute `else if`. The element is present in the final html when the condition is true.

attributes.name: :else
attributes.description: Conditional attribute. The element is present in the final html otherwise.

attributes.name: :foreach
attributes.description: Loop attribute `for each`. Values should be as PHP `foreach` loop. Introduce a local variable for each value in the collection.

attributes.name: :forelse
attributes.description: Loop attribute combined with `foreach`. The element is present in the final html when the collection is empty.
